“Related Persons” means (i) as to Apple, Apple’s officers, directors, employees, and subsidiaries, any entity in which Apple has a controlling interest, any of Apple’s accountants and auditors, solely in their capacity as agents of Apple or while acting as agents of Apple, and Apple’s lawyers, solely in their capacity as counsel for Apple, and (ii) as to the Defendants, (1) each spouse, immediate family member, heir, executor, or estate of any of them, and (2) any trust in respect of which any of the Defendants, or any spouse or immediate family member thereof serves as a settlor, beneficiary, or trustee.
